replies.body: Isn't it meant to be arclight vel'koz not battle cast? :(
Yea, I already seen Battle Cast Vel'koz on sale a few weeks ago. That's how I got the skin.

This is clearly got nothing to do with the topic here... but since im a sona main i just wanted to know if ur ever going to change the pentakill and arcade sound effects... they're pretty lacking :/ also the pentakill is 975 rp and it literally changes nothing but the model itself....  {{champion:37}} {{item:3070}}
